Title: Discussion column for MOSS 2007
Description: Discussion column for MOSS 2007/ (WSS 3.0) is a field column for different type lists such as Custom List, Document Library, Issue Tracking, not only for Issue Tracking type list. This control displays comments for item of list.
HomeWiki:
Discussion column for MOSS 2007/ (WSS 3.0) is a field column for different type lists such as Custom List, Document Library, Issue Tracking, not only for Issue Tracking type list. This control displays comments for item of list (look like as SPFieldMultiColumn, but more advanced).

Features (1.0):
  • Display comments as list of changes
  • Allow to view of history of changes
  • Tooltip in list view
  • Simple in use
  • Simple installation
  • Localized:
    • English
    • Russian
  • Use tooltip

Installation
Follow these instructions on how to install the Discussion column for MOSS 2007/WSS 3.0.

Configuration
IMPORTANT: You need activate feature to deploy resources.


Requirements
  • For Use
    • Internet Explorer 5.0 and higher
    • Fire Fox 3.0 and higher
  • For Development
    • Visual Studio 2005/2008
    • WSS 3.0 / MOSS 2007
